#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
 
void swapp(int &a,int &b){
  int temp;
  temp=a;
  a=b;
  b=temp;
}
int main(){
 int t,area,x1,x2,y1,y2,x3,x4,y3,y4,mx2,my1,my2;
 ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
 cin>>t;
 while(t--){
    cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2>>x3>>y3>>x4>>y4;
    if(x1>x2){
        swapp(x1,x2);
        swapp(y1,y2);
    }
 
    if(x3>x4){
        swapp(x3,x4);
        swapp(y3,y4);
    }
    if(y1>y2){
        swapp(y1,y2);
    }
    if(y3>y4){
        swapp(y3,y4);
    }
    if(x1>x3)
    {
        swapp(x1,x3);
        swapp(y1,y3);
        swapp(x2,x4);
        swapp(y2,y4);
    }
    //cout<<x1<<" "<<x3<<endl;
    area =(x2-x1)*(y2-y1)+(x4-x3)*(y4-y3);
   // cout<<area<<endl;
    if(x2>=x3){
        if(y1<=y3 || y2>=y4 || (y1>=y3 && y2<=y4)){
            if(x2>x4)
                mx2=x4;
            else
                mx2=x2;
            if(y2>y4)
                my2=y4;
            else
                my2=y2;
            if(y1<y3)
                my1=y3;
            else
                my1=y1;
            area-=(mx2-x3)*(my2-my1);
            if((mx2-x3)*(my2-my1)<0){
                area+=(mx2-x3)*(my2-my1);
            }
        }
        }
    cout<<area<<endl;
 }
 return 0;
}
